plot outline: The story follows Balan (Kaushik), a young artist who becomes disillusioned by the current political situation of his society. He joins the revolutionary organization Ooruku Nooruper, accidentally kills a priest and is sentenced to death. The film examines various issues related to capital punishment.
title: Ooruku Nooruper
plot: The story follows Balan (Kaushik), a young artist who becomes disillusioned by the current political situation of his society. He joins the revolutionary organization _Ooruku Nooruper_ (qv), accidentally kills a priest and is sentenced to death. The film examines various issues related to capital punishment.::kirti raj singh
